title: The moste true reporte of Iames Fitz Morrice death, and others the like offe[n]ders: with a brief discourse of rebellion, dedicated to the ribht [sic] worshipfull my louying freende M. Drewe Drewrie, brother to the honourable sir Willyam Drewrie, lorde Iustice of Irelande. Written by Thomas Churchyard Gent
author: Churchyard, Thomas, 1520?-1604.
publicationStmtPublisher: By [Felix Kingston for] Edward VVhite, dwellyng at the little northdore of S. Paules churche, at the signe of the Gunne,
